item.title: Budget-Friendly 10g pfSense Build with HP t740 for Effortless Networking
item.description: Discover how to effortlessly build a 10 gigabit capable pfSense router and firewall on a budget using the HP t740, ensuring high-performance networking for your needs.

item.title: Networking Basics: Subnetting, VLANs, and Efficient Network Management
item.category: "Networking Basics" , "Subnetting" , "VLANs" , "Network Management" , "Network Security" , "IP Addressing" , "Network Segmentation" , "Efficient Resource Utilization" , "Network Performance" , "IPv4"
item.description: Learn the essentials of subnets, subnetting, and VLANs for efficient network management and enhanced security
